newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: SOUTH AFRICA LAUNCHES PHARMACEUTICAL CLUSTER STUDY.
newsitem.headline: SOUTH AFRICA LAUNCHES PHARMACEUTICAL CLUSTER STUDY.

text.p: South Africa will formally launch a pharmaceuticals cluster study on October 22, the department of trade and industry said in a statement on Friday.
The move is part of a joint approach with the National Economic Development and Labour Council (Nedlac) and the state-owned Industrial Development Corporation (IDC).
The aim is develop a "cluster", or industry grouping, approach to secure a viable domestic pharmaceutical industry which creates and sustains jobs, the department said.
Industry representatives will consider the best way forward at a pharmaceutical industry forum on October 22.
